snippets.title: Delete one document using MongoDB CRUD operations in Atlas Functions
snippets.description: You can delete a single document by performing MongoDB CRUD operations using an Atlas Function. Pass the objectID as an argument to the Atlas Function, and use 'deleteOne' in the Function context.

snippets.title: Insert one document using MongoDB CRUD operations in Atlas Functions
snippets.description: You can insert a single document by performing MongoDB CRUD operations using an Atlas Function. Pass the arguments to the Atlas Function, and use 'insertOne' in the Function context.
